DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation whether Brotizolam is absorbed through the mucous membrane of oral cavity when WE 941 OD tablets are administered in Japanese healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacological Study on Absorption of WE 941 OD Tablets in Japanese Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteers age 20 35 years body weight 50 80 kg Body Mass Index (BMI) +/ 20%
